issue.title: Missing CSS class for search/filters/actions top bars : "sdi-searchcriteria"
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In most of easySDI list screens, we miss the class "sdi-searchcriteria"


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:

Found that this class exists in some views : "sdi-searchcriteria"
